environment.logic.constructs.players

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPlayer

    public interface Player
    The interface for implementing new playable characters
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkForDeath()
      Checks if the player has achieved death criteria.
      void checkObjectives()
      Checks if the player has intercepted an objective and if so, performs that objectives action.
      Entity getEntity()
      Retrieves the Entity assigned to the Player.
      void gravity()
      The player's state.
      boolean isAlive()
      Gets the current state of the player.
      void jump()
      Simulates the player jumping.
      void move(int changeInX, int changeInY)
      Moves the player a specified X distance.

        The player's state.

        Moves the player a specified X distance.
        Parameters:
        changeInX - The change in X coordinate for the Player Entity.
        changeInY - Unused

        Simulates the player jumping.

        The Entity assigned to the Player.

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Gets the current state of the player.
        Returns:
        boolean whether the player is alive or dead. Where true means alive and false means dead.
